tasks.label: Generate compile_commands.json
args: BUILD_DIR=$(ls .esphome/build/ | head -1) && cd .esphome/build/$BUILD_DIR && pio run --target compiledb && ln -sf $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/.esphome/build/$BUILD_DIR/compile_commands.json $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/compile_commands.json
